H0.text: Which British race track has corners named Copse, Maggots and Becketts. Brands Hatch

H1.text: Which British race track has corners named Copse, Maggots and Becketts. Donington Park

H2.text: Which British race track has corners named Copse, Maggots and Becketts. Oulton Park

H3.text: Which British race track has corners named Copse, Maggots and Becketts. Silverstone

A4.text: Copse, Abbey and all of the straights, save the Farm Straight were redesigned at Silverstone.

A5.text: Maggotts, Becketts and Chapel were re-designed as very fast snaky esses that proved to be even more challenging than the original series of corners at Silverstone.
